consonaR - Consonance-based composing with Musical Scales and Spectra

Overview

consonaR implements consonance-based algorithms for composing music, based on William Sethares’ Tuning, Timbre, Spectrum, Scale (Sethares 2013).

References

Sethares, W. A. 2013. Tuning, Timbre, Spectrum, Scale. Springer London.
